channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Plugin LBstopattack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Plugin LBstopattack

item.title: CVE-2022-3097|2024-08-03T01:00:10.709Z -- unknown -- plugin%20lbstopattack
item.description: The Plugin LBstopattack WordPress plugin before 1.1.3 does not use nonces when saving its settings, making it possible for attackers to conduct CSRF attacks. This could allow attackers to disable the plugin's protections.
